name: Rotation Bounce
description:
This game was created for the Kenny Game Jam (2021) with the theme of "Rotation." It was created using Godot. It is my first jam game, and the first game I've done to such a small time limit. I'm very proud of the result.

It came 27th overall, out of 367 entries!


https://itch.io/jam/kenney-jam-2021

There are 20 stages in the game, ending in a boss fight. It was made in just 2 days.

All art in this game is by Kenny, as the jam requires. Kenny's art is incredibly numerous AND public domain, so it is a holy grail for game developers.

INSTRUCTIONS: Use the arrow keys or WASD to rotate the world. Collect all the coins in the level to advance, and make sure you avoid the obstacles.

This game is copyright Jack Robotham 2021.
